Science Working Groups

SWMLV science is organized into seven working groups:

The Solar Neighborhood
coordinators: Ben Burningham (University of Hertfordshire), Sebastien Lepine (American Museum of Natural History)

Star Clusters
coordinators: Leo Girardi (INAF Osservatorio Astronomico di Padova), Kristen Dage (McGill University)

Variable Stars
coordinators: TBD

The Galactic Bulge
coordinators: Will Clarkson (University of Michigan), Victor Debattista (University of Central Lancashire)

Galactic Structure and ISM
coordinators: Peregrine McGehee (SLAC National Accelerator Laboratory)

Magellanic Clouds
coordinators: Knut Olsen (NOIRLab)

Near Field Cosmology
coordinators: Massimo Dallâ€™Ora (INAF Osservatorio Astronomico di Capodimonte)
